intro.title: Your next fullstack
intro.subtitle: Hello! I'm Daniel Bueno, I'm 17 years old and a fullstack developer

paragraph.text1: My name is Daniel Bueno, and technology has been a passion of mine since childhood. I began developing and programming in 2022, which sparked a deep love for the field. Since then, I have been constantly striving to improve my skills. This passion led me to apply for the Systems Development course at Etec Jaraguá, alongside my high school education. Fortunately, I was accepted, achieving the honor of securing second place.
paragraph.text2: Currently, I am in my third year of high school at Etec Jaraguá. I work on projects using ReactJS, NodeJS, NextJS, among other technologies, and I am eager to explore new languages, tools, and frameworks. I plan to apply for internship positions to gain professional experience, as I have not yet worked in this field.
paragraph.text3: I enjoy learning new things to apply to my projects and always dedicate part of my day to studying development independently. Beyond technology, I have a passion for weight training, fighting Muay Thai, biking, camping, listening to music, going to church, and watching dividends being deposited into my account.

ds.text: See everything about the Systems Development course!
ds.about: Developed in partnership with two school friends, with the goal of promoting our course and increasing our visibility, this idea was suggested by a teacher, and we decided to take on the responsibility for the project. This was my first development project with ReactJS!

short.text: Know the content of the video without even opening it.
short.about: Short Summary allows users to view a summary of the video without needing to watch it, using artificial intelligence to extract the text and create the summary. This was my first experience with Express, which taught me a lot about NodeJS.

age.about: The Age Calculator is a web application that allows users to calculate their age in years, months, and days. This project allowed me to learn a lot about date manipulation in JavaScript, as well as improve my skills with forms in HTML and CSS.

ticket.text: Generate your Coding Conf event ticket!
ticket.about: The Ticket Generator is a web application that allows users to generate their ticket for the Coding Conf (fictional) event. In this project, I learned form handling, data validation with Zod + React Hook Form, and automatically sending emails with EmailJs. I also deepened my knowledge of Next.js.

notes.about: Notes is a web application that allows users to make daily notes, with the ability to save, edit, and delete them. This project allowed me to deepen my knowledge of Fullstack programming with Express.js and MongoDB.
